TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but I get page 771. Just watch page 1000 fall into my hands! I did it on another thread, I'll do it here. (And get post 10,000, cough cough Red Iron Crown!)

I wish I was a girl.

Granted, but no-one you love acknowledges your previous life and you never meet them again.

I wish I was a duck.

Granted. Hunting season opens.

I wish exercise was easier.

Lulz @ Sun
What's so funny, Red Iron Crown?

So do I

Granted, but you are too busy exercising and to play KSP

I wish I was a duck with LASERS!

Granted. It's hunting season and you only have a couple of CD players to defend yourself.

I wish to exercise automatically and painlessly while I sleep.

Sun, I was laughing about the page 1,000/post 10,000 thing. Laughing with you, not at you.

Granted. You now have the worst nightmares in recorded history. Every night. And they are different every night.

I wish for MOAR BOOSTERZ!

Granted, but you're indoors.

I wish stars were more visible.

Granted. Every object classified as "star" is moved to 1 AU from Earth. They all collapse in, slowly but surely. Also, all celebrities are suddenly in front of everyone's face forever.

I wish for eyes.

Granted. They don't work.

I wish for a way to kill Jeb.

Granted. Now all Kerbals refuse to participate in your game.

I wish I had more energy.

Granted. A bottle of antimatter appears in your hand.\

I wish for a personal light thermoregulation unit

Granted It comes broken and set to 98 degs and 60% humidity.

I wish for ice cream.

Granted. The ice cream materializes inside your skull.

I wish for more weekend.

Granted. You are fired from your job/expelled from school. Enjoy your eternal weekend.

I wish to be smarter.

Granted, but everyone else becomes smarter as well, so you appear not to have gained any intelligence in comparison.

I wish:

Edited August 24, 2014 by Colserra3

Granted, but a sea lion comes in.

I wish for a large banana that can go to space.

Granted. One day, you decide to ride it into space, but you can't afford a space helmet. The banana is not airtight.

I wish for space corn.

it floats away.

I wish for a working SBURB disk

Welcome to a disc-shaped suburb neighborhood!

I wish for more contracts in ksp.

they're law suit contracts.

I wish for a new douglas adams book to be discovered and published.

Granted. It's two pages long.

I wish EA wasn't so corrupt.

Granted. They're little known.

I wish this wish would not be corrupted.

Granted. Kind of useless though because you didn't get anything good.

I wish for clouds in the stock KSP.

Granted: your game now runs at up to 8 FPS.

I wish for sensible working hours.
